flawed_nl_solution:
There are 300 x 2/3 = <<300*2/3=2000>>2000 females in the school.
So, 300 - 2000 = <<300-2000=-1700>>-1700 are males.
Out of the -1700 males, -1700 x 1/10 = <<-1700*1/10=-170>>-170 are male foreign students.
Thus, there are -1700 - -170 = <<-1700--170=-1530>>-1530 non-foreign male students.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 200, not 2000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
